name: Clockerture Science
description:
This is our submission for the Hyper-Casual Game Jam #2!

You are Clocky, a creation of Clockerture Science (totally not a reference). You have to scape from the lab using your powers to stop time and alter the size of different items. It's full of traps and puzzles so... Good luck!

Controls:

Movement -> A/D

Jump -> Space bar

Freeze time -> E

  - When time is freezed:

  - Move objects -> Left mouse button

  - Focus on objects -> Right mouse button

  - Zoom in/out (Change size) -> Mouse wheel

Restart level -> R

Credits

Álvaro Díaz Dueñas

Nader Aboud Cubero

Music by: Bensound
